# Dotfiles

These dotfiles are managed by [chezmoi](https://www.chezmoi.io/)

Sane configuration and minimalistic one.

Actual OS : Arch Linux

## Overview

most used apps are written in a separate .txt file.

- Code Editor : Neovim
- Window Manager : Sway
- Terminal : Wezterm
- Font : Maple Font
- Theme : my own theme [here](https://github.com/Yushi5058/expressoft)
- Browser : Firefox using [ublock origin filters](https://github.com/yokoffing/filterlists#guidelines)
  ![ublock origin filters](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/11689349/327171428-f1925d65-963f-4bb8-aebf-d083ee5f9825.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..NSnlOQoWmb-OALlAcMKS4fObl3NXgG5Ec5QY5H1fYfo)
